content.rendered:
Directed by Sabir Khan.

Written by Shifuji Shaurya Bharadwaj. Sanjeev Datta. Sanjeev Dutta. Madhiyalagan Subbiah.

Cast Tiger Shroff(Ronny). Shraddha Kapoor(Sia). Sudheer Babu Posani(Raghav Shetty). Shifuji Shaurya Bharadwaj(Guruswamy). Sunil Grover(P.P. Khurana). Sourav Chakraborty(Biju). Aryan Prajapati(Subbu). Sanjay Mishra(Harry). Sumit Gulati(Sukhi) . Ahmed Amjad(Amjad).Paras Arora. Jaikant Bhardwaj(Villan). Samir Chandra(Politician). Jakkrit Kanokpodjananon(Kim). Jagdish Kansara(Lawyer). Mohammad Salman Khan(Salman). Buddya Sunari Magar(Refree). Lalit Kumar Malla(Bodyguard (Right hand)). Nileshpatelxyz(Sp nilesh). Teena Paradkar(Dancer). Kota Srinivasa Rao(Film Producer). Biswapati Sarkar(Hari). Chobber Sidhu(Armaan). Prashant Singh(Gopi). Ron Smoorenburg(Fight Club Fighter – Jack). Dz Sobuj(Sobuj). Chivpatrick Tang(Yong). Kazu Patrick Tang(Yong). Jason Tham(Kim)

Language Hindi.

Producers Bharat Bohra. Dipti Jindal. Rakesh Madhotra. Sajid Nadiadwala. Vikram Raazdan. Rafique. Vikram Razdan.

Production Nadiadwala Grandson Entertainment.
